A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it\, even more so after a second viewing. At first I had a hard time accepting where the story went\, especially in regards to Luke. But\, to quote Kylo\, it’s time to “let the past die”. What most of us love about Star Wars is the seemingly limitless possibilities in that galaxy far\, far away. In this movie\, we learn that the force is much more expansive than we first believed\, and that it’s real power isn’t limited by the Jedi’s narrow interpretation of it. Finally\, we get to witness something Obi-Wan referred to so many years ago when Luke becomes “more powerful than [we] can possibly imagine”. Don’t limit your own view of what you believe these movies should be\, and enjoy the ride!
